name: Spread
description:
Spread is a 2D single player game where the player is a virus trying to infect as many cells as possible. The game takes place on the cellular level of a creature. Where the game mode switches between attacking the body and avoiding the defense systems.

It was made for the 2018 Global Game Jam!

The team was as follows

PK Kowalewski : Sound Designer

James Jowers : Programmer

Will Pyle : Programmer

Phil Edwards : Programmer

Zac Bolubasz : Animator

Katherine Souza : Art Director/Artist

Sonja LaRosa : UI/Assets Artist

Lci Iarocci : Project Manager
